Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: A round-up of what people are saying across media platforms: AFL's announcement of Gil McLachlan's replacement may be delayed until Federal government reportedly decides on funding of the Tasmanian Macquarie Point stadium. Critics argue that stage 3 tax cuts are fiscally irresponsible and a costly expense to the country's budget. Other posts discuss the challenges faced with implementing the Treasurer's ideas. While finally some tweets are urging support for the ACT Suburb Zero initiative and remote ovals in Budget 2023.
